name: Drummer Talent VR
description: Drummer Talent VR is a drumming simulation VR music game. Everyone can be a drum talent, come and join us.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit or higher Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD 390 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
